title: This Black trans activist is fighting to shield her community from an epidemic of violence
description: As a teenage runaway in the foster care system and forced into homelessness, Vanessa Warri's childhood was marked by trauma -- but she's overcoming her early circumstances despite the odds.

title: Covid-19 vaccines may prevent infection and not just symptoms, study suggests
description: Health experts have said that data so far has shown that Covid-19 vaccines prevent symptoms of the virus -- but a new study suggests that the Moderna and Pfizer vaccines may also prevent infections.

title: The US deported a 95-year-old former Nazi concentration camp guard
description: A Tennessee resident who was a guard at a Nazi concentration camp during World War II has been deported to Germany, the US Justice Department said in a statement Friday.

title: How a bad response to a weather disaster can ruin a political career
description: The tragic situation in Texas following this week's historic cold snap and power outages has people pointing fingers. Perhaps the ire has been pointed toward no one more than Texas Sen. Ted Cruz, who left the state for Cancun, Mexico.

title: Alexey Navalny remains in jail as court rejects his appeal. Then he's fined $11,500 in defamation case
description: Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny will remain behind bars after a Russian court partially rejected his appeal over a two-and-a-half year prison sentence handed down earlier this month.

title: Ingenuity helicopter phones home from Mars
description:
• Incredible new images of Mars
• Look at a life-sized model of Mars rover Perseverance

title: Hotel that hosted a mostly maskless rally for Florida's governor is under investigation
Why Joe Biden went to Wisconsin -- and will be back
description: President Joe Biden took his first big trip as president this week when he went to Wisconsin for a CNN town hall. The fact that Biden chose to go to Wisconsin shouldn't be lost on anyone. He will likely be going to the state a lot as president.

title: This device is crucial in the fight against Covid. It may not work on dark skin
description: In the fight against Covid-19, the pulse oximeter has been an essential tool for doctors and other medical professionals. But the small device that monitors oxygen levels may not work well for people with dark skin, according to multiple studies and government health agencies.

title: Myanmar police open fire on protesters, leaving at least two dead, say reports
description: Police opened fire on protesters in the Myanmar city of Mandalay on Saturday, leaving at least two dead, according to volunteer emergency workers cited by Reuters and AFP news agencies who have reporters on the ground.

title: Bill Gates: Texas deaths were preventable
description: In an interview with CNN's Anderson Cooper, Bill Gates said deaths during Texas' winter freeze were preventable, caused by the state's decision not to weatherize its energy.

title: Black women executives making history
description: Kamala Harris isn't the only Black woman making history in 2021.

title: Strangers took in a delivery driver for 5 days after she was stranded in the Texas storm
Kim Kardashian West files for divorce from Kanye West
description: Kim Kardashian West has filed for divorce from Kanye West, a court clerk for Los Angeles Superior Court confirmed to CNN on Friday.

title: These are the women who crushed the Caliphate
description: In early 2016, the first time a friend told Gayle Tzemach Lemmon the story of Kurdish Women's Projection Units in northeastern Syria -- also known as the YPJ -- she had two reactions. The first was fascination: How had no one else told the tale of these women, aligned with US forces (and later provided with support by the Trump administration) who were fighting the Islamic State -- a group which routinely kidnapped, raped and murdered women?

title: Inside Europe's biggest Hindu temple, myths get debunked and vaccines administered
description: Hasmita Patel shuffles quickly between vaccination pods, stopping to peer inside each cubicle and greet her staff.

title: Meet the bunnies who helped people survive 2020
description: February 20 is National Love Your Pet Day. Many have relied on their furry friends during the pandemic. Here, two people tell the story of how their rabbits helped them survive not only the past year but some of life's biggest challenges.

title: Naomi Osaka overcomes Jennifer Brady to win second Australian Open title
description: Naomi Osaka powered her way to a second Australian Open title with a comprehensive straight sets victory over grand slam final debutant Jennifer Brady.

title: Bereft of visitors, the Louvre keeps busy with major refit and restorations
description: As the world's most visited museum awakens, escalators that once carried up to 40,000 pairs of feet a day loop quietly through the empty lobby.

title: See what's behind the Louvre's closed doors
description: The world's most visited museum has been shuttered for the longest time since WWII, due to the pandemic. CNN goes behind the scenes as a busy team of artisans is hard at work completing vital restoration.

title: Missing princess 'being cared for at home,' Dubai royal family says
description: Dubai's royal family says Princess Latifa is "being cared for at home," dismissing videos in which she accused them of holding her hostage since she attempted to flee abroad in 2018.

title: A 50-year pen pal friendship that began with a message in a bottle
description: Robbinroger Beever was 15 years old and walking home along a beach in Liberia, West Africa.

title: A raging fire engulfs a hotel in Texas
description: A Hilton Garden Inn near Fort Hood in Killeen, Texas went up in flames Friday night.

title: Boris Johnson's government is 'gaslighting' Britain about the realities of Brexit, critics say
description: Andy Trust has been exporting fish from Cornwall to continental Europe for 20 years. However, the past seven weeks have given him cause to contemplate shutting down the entire European operation of his fish merchants, Ocean Harvest. "The cost of sending fish into Europe has more than trebled. In an industry that operates on thin profit margins, it could destroy British fishing," he says.

title: 2 people are killed in a military plane crash near Montgomery, Alabama
description: Two people were killed when a military plane crashed on Friday near the Montgomery Regional Airport in Alabama, according to the facility's executive director Marshall Taggart, Jr.

title: Two women dressed as 'grannies' tried to get Covid-19 vaccine
description: Two women were caught trying to get second doses of the Covid-19 vaccine by dressing up as "grannies." They came to the vaccination site wearing bonnets, gloves, and glasses.

title: US national security adviser on massive hack: We're looking beyond sanctions
description: CNN's Christiane Amanpour talks to US National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan about the SolarWinds hack. Sullivan says that Biden's White House is considering a range of responses to the suspected Russian spying campaign, not just sanctions.

title: Asian-American man suffers a severed finger in attack
description: An elementary school teacher's aide was waiting for a bus in Rosemead, California, when he was brutally attacked on Sunday, suffering a severed finger, according to the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department.
